message.content: cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DB. The paper discusses the problem of information retrieval in scientific literature, which is a common topic in the Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Digital Libraries (cs.DL) sub-categories. The use of thesauri and classifications to describe scientific documents suggests a connection to Natural Language Processing (cs.CL) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Finally, the proposed implementation of web services for Digital Library systems could also fall under the Database (cs.DB) sub-category.
